theme.title: Theme
theme.description: Choose your preferred theme for the interface

createWorkspaceDialog.title: Create Workspace
createWorkspaceDialog.description: Create a new workspace to organize your tools.

deleteWorkspaceDialog.title: Delete Workspace
deleteWorkspaceDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete this workspace?

Tools.title: Tools
Tools.description: Welcome to the tools page! Here you can find tools for your workspaces.
Tools.uploadToolLabel: Also you can upload your own tool by clicking the button below

uploadToolDialog.title: Upload Tool
uploadToolDialog.description: Download your tool in the form of a ZIP file. The archive should contain files Main.js, manifest.json, readme.md. The archive should not exceed 10 MB
uploadToolDialog.zipFileSizeError: Zip file size must be less than 10MB
uploadToolDialog.dragDropOrClick: Drag & drop a file here, or click to select
uploadToolDialog.invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Please select a ZIP file.
